title: Connect Student with Peer Mentor
description: A first-year student is feeling overwhelmed and wants to be connected with a peer mentor.

tasks.description: Identify the student and their major.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's identity and academic program.

tasks.description: Search the peer mentor database for a suitable mentor in the same major.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available upper-class mentor in the student's major.

tasks.description: Send a formal introduction email connecting the student and the peer mentor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent facilitates the connection between the two students.
